short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play in your browser a classic MahJong solitaire game!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Mahjong extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Mahjong icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Mahjong popup will open. Tap on the popup or press "Spacebar" to start ;)
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY
Find and match pairs of identical Mahjongg tiles. Remove all tiles to complete a board.

FEATURES
- Over 1500 boards
- Classic gameplay
- Free hints
- Daily challenges
- Free themes
- Support Tablet
- More games
NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
